title: CAR MODEL detail page Â» connected CAR MODELS
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see the successor and predecessor of a CAR MODEL (if existent)\
So I can find out more about its family tree
description:
* the existing CAR MODEL detail page is extended 
* a section is added that displays the connected CAR MODELS (successor and/or predecessor)
* when there is no successor then it will not be shown (also no placeholder)
* when there is no predecessor then it will not be shown (also no placeholder)
* when there is no successor and no predecessor then the section is not displayed at all
* successor and predecessor link to the resp. CAR MODELS
